name: Nescodeapp
tagline: Django Based Application For Managing Human Resource Department
body:
### Welcome to NESCODE.

NESCODE APPLICATION SCOPE

Ver 0.1
Author: Sunil Kumar
Contributors:Raman Kumar
Date: 09th Jan 2015

Project brief:

Nescode application is a long term project with a goal to achieve a - complete business application to manage day-to-day operation. Project work will start from developing “Human Resource Management” system. To start the human resource management system - development will start from generating offer letter for employee.


https://github.com/nescoderaman/nescodeapp.git
...
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Application or Installation? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/nescoderaman/nescodeapp or contact support@github.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
